author: RAMDev

changelog.release_notes:
Addition: Now vibrates a bit when you win.  Solve time tracking and high-scores will be added in 2.0.
Fix: Instead of lighting up all the time, only lights up temporarily when the ball rolls, as if you pressed a button. 
Fix: Movement is prioritized properly (if it can either roll up or sideways, it chooses up if you lean up more).
Fix: Duplicate event loops don't appear when you press select again (app used to go into hyperspeed when you pressed select a bunch).

Also cleaned up some code behind the scenes. Special super-duper thanks to the pebble team- without their help this app wouldn't exist, and without their gift I couldn't make this update!
Exactly what we presented at the Expo.  Images are placeholders.

description:
PebbleMaze is a "virtual tabletop" marble maze where you tilt in the direction you want to go to reach your goal.

The maze is uniquely procedurally generated each game. The up and down buttons change difficulty.

latest_release.release_notes:
Addition: Now vibrates a bit when you win.  Solve time tracking and high-scores will be added in 2.0.
Fix: Instead of lighting up all the time, only lights up temporarily when the ball rolls, as if you pressed a button. 
Fix: Movement is prioritized properly (if it can either roll up or sideways, it chooses up if you lean up more).
Fix: Duplicate event loops don't appear when you press select again (app used to go into hyperspeed when you pressed select a bunch).

Also cleaned up some code behind the scenes. Special super-duper thanks to the pebble team- without their help this app wouldn't exist, and without their gift I couldn't make this update!

title: Maze
